data.name: Target
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Target is a Multiplayer game where you team up with your friends and compete in Team deathmatch rounds, change your character and plan strategic ways to dominate the battlefield!

features

• Customization: Customize your character to your own liking, selecting across our vast customization available.
• Battle: Team up with your friends and take down your opponents in a strategic way.


Bear in mind, the game is in development so expect a lot of updates and changes. This is NOT the final product.

data.short_description: TARGET is an action-packed, multiplayer shooter based on children's Toy Tanks. Upgrade your tank to strategize your odds in the game and conquer the playing field.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Phenom X3 8750 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800GT 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 3870 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Broadband connection required for multiplayer gameplay
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

Minimum:
